entities.name: colin
entities.description: Colin is a student who says goodbye to Harry before being swept away by the crowd.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is being talked about by Colin and his friends.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who wonders what Colin said about him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who expresses disgust at the rumors spreading about Harry.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin Finch-Fletchley is a student who ran away from Harry during lunchtime.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who couldn't cure Mrs. Norris.

entities.name: mrs norris
entities.description: Mrs. Norris is a cat that was attacked and couldn't be cured by Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Colin says goodbye to Harry before being swept away by the crowd.
Dumbledore couldn't cure Mrs. Norris, which makes Hermione think that whatever attacked her might not be human.
Justin Finch-Fletchley ran away from Harry during lunchtime, which makes Harry remember this when he hears the rumors about him.
Ron believes the rumors spreading about Harry and expresses disgust at them.
